explains: adj. 不可思议的，难以置信的；惊人的，极大的，极多的；了不起的，极好的

sentences.en: I felt I'd made an incredible discovery.
sentences.cn: 我感到自己有了一个惊人的发现。

sentences.en: "It was incredible," Kurt says, suddenly aglow.
sentences.cn: “简直是令人难以置信，”库尔特突然容光焕发地说到。

sentences.en: It was an incredible display of motherly love and forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 那是慈母般关爱与宽容的一次令人难以置信的体现。
